phases.objective: Navigate to https://console.zerodha.com/dashboard and verify dashboard elements.

assertions.description: Verify that key performance indicators like account value, equity holdings, and cash balance are displayed
Verify that account summary information loads successfully

test_files.name: Explore Portfolio Positions and Trade History
test_files.title: Explore Portfolio Positions and Trade History

phases.objective: Navigate to https://console.zerodha.com/dashboard and click on the 'Portfolio' navigation link.

assertions.description: Verify that portfolio positions section loads

phases.objective: Click on the 'Reports' navigation link and select 'Tradebook' from the options.

assertions.description: Verify that trade history table loads with data or a prompt to build a report

test_files.name: Review Account Information and Activation Options
test_files.title: Review Account Information and Activation Options

phases.objective: Navigate to https://console.zerodha.com/account and click on the 'Segment Activation' link.

assertions.description: Verify that segment activation page loads with options for different trading segments

phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://console.zerodha.com/reports/tradebook and apply segment and date range filters.

assertions.description: Verify that report data updates according to applied segment and date range filters

phases.objective: Navigate to https://console.zerodha.com/funds to check available balances and fund actions.

assertions.description: Verify that available fund balances (e.g., cash, collateral) are displayed
Verify that options for adding or withdrawing funds are readily accessible
